content: Great Intro! Sacha Greif Very helpful, I especially like the personal assistant comparison. My team did a GraphQL Hackathon a few months back. I was very impressed with the ease of setup & iteration. GraphQL is now my goto for any projects with fragmented service layers. It’s very often we run into the problem wit v1 and v2 services alive at the same time. GraphQL is an amazing way to contain that issue.
